description: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file located in suspicious locations.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Mstsc.EXE Execution From Uncommon Parent
query: (process.parent.executable.text:("*\\brave.exe" OR "*\\CCleanerBrowser.exe" OR "*\\chrome.exe" OR "*\\chromium.exe" OR "*\\firefox.exe" OR "*\\iexplore.exe" OR "*\\microsoftedge.exe" OR "*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\opera.exe" OR "*\\vivaldi.exe" OR "*\\whale.exe" OR "*\\outlook.exe") AND ((process.executable.text:"*\\mstsc.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"mstsc.exe")))
